title: A real challenger mission not complete?
body: My "a real challenger" worlds mission says it's 1/4 missions complete even though I've done all of  this weeks missions. I've seen some other posts saying this is a glitch or something?

replies.body: We'll have to wait for the next set of missions comes out. As Worlds progresses we'll be getting more missions, but I'm not 100% sure on when they'll show up just yet. It originally looked like it would be Thursday each week, but it may not be until next week I'm being told.
